config.name: client
config.description: The Client is used to send requests to resources on CoAP servers and/or to observe these. The CoAP server address (host, port) configured here is default for the requests using this client. The request can override if necessary.

parameter.name: endpoint
parameter.description: Endpoint configuration to use for the client.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The default hostname or ip of the server to address. Can be overridden by the host setting on operations.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The default port the server is listening on. Can be overridden by the port setting on the operation.

config.name: server
config.description: The Server is used to receive requests on resources from CoAP clients. The configuration is static, which means Mule will create one instance per configuration.

parameter.name: resources
parameter.description: The root resources of the server.

parameter.name: protocolStageThreadCount
parameter.description: Thread pool size of endpoint executor. Default value is equal to the number of cores.

extension.name: CoAP
extension.description: A Mule extension that adds CoAP functionality to create CoAP clients and CoAP servers.

operation.name: discover
operation.description: The Discover processor retrieves information about CoAP resources of a server.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: queryParams
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the request.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: observerList
operation.description: This processor returns a list of observers. The list contains the uri's of the active observers of the CoAP client.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: observerStart
operation.description: The Start Observer processor creates an observer on the CoAP client. It starts observing the specified server resource immediately.

parameter.name: handlerName
parameter.description: Name of the response handler that will process the notification received from server.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path of the resource.

parameter.name: queryParams
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the request.

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: The CoAP options to send with the request.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path of the resource.

parameter.name: queryParams
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the request.

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: The CoAP options to send with the request.

operation.name: ping
operation.description: The Ping processor checks whether a CoAP server is reachable.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: request
operation.description: The Request Processor issues a request on a CoAP server. The processor blocks until a response is received or a timeout occurs.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: requestCode
parameter.description: The CoAP request code specifying the requested action on the resource on the server.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: private When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path of the resource.

parameter.name: queryParams
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the request.

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: The CoAP options to send with the request.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: requestAsync
operation.description: The RequestAsync Processor issues a request on a CoAP server asynchronously. The processor doea not wait for the response and will not block. The handling of a response (if any) is delegated to the response handler.

parameter.name: responseHandler
parameter.description: Name of the handler that will receive the response.

parameter.name: requestCode
parameter.description: The CoAP request code specifying the requested action on the resource on the server.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: private When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to address. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path of the resource.

parameter.name: queryParams
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the request.

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: The CoAP options to send with the request.

operation.name: notify
operation.description: The Notify processor initiates notifications to observing clients. Use this when the resource content has changed. For every observing client and resource an internal get-request is issued on the listener concerned. The response that the listener flow will be used as notication as is sent to the observing client.

parameter.name: uriPattern
parameter.description: The uri pattern specifies the resource(s) that have changed content. Wildcards can be used, like "/*" or "/some/deeper/resources/*".

operation.name: resourceAdd
operation.description: The Resource Add processor dynamically adds a new resource to the CoAP server. The uri needs to be a complete resource-path, including all parent resource(s). All parent resources in the path must exist already. The resource is available to clients immediately, provided there is a listener configured which has an uri pattern that applies to it.

parameter.name: uri
parameter.description: The uri of the resource to add.

parameter.name: get
parameter.description: When true the resource accepts get-requests.

parameter.name: put
parameter.description: When true the resource accepts put-requests.

parameter.name: post
parameter.description: When true the resource accepts post-requests.

parameter.name: delete
parameter.description: When true the resource accepts delete-requests.

parameter.name: observable
parameter.description: When true the resource accepts observe-requests.

parameter.name: earlyAck
parameter.description: When true an immediate acknowledgement is sent to the client before processing the request and returning response.

parameter.name: info
parameter.description: Meta-information of the resource.

operation.name: resourceExists
operation.description: The Resource Exists processor checks whether the CoAP server has one or more resources matching given uri pattern.

parameter.name: uriPattern
parameter.description: The uri pattern of the resource(s) to be found. A wildcard can be used, e.g. "/tobefound/*".

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: resourceList
operation.description: Returns a list of uri's of the resources, that match given uri pattern.

parameter.name: uriPattern
parameter.description: The uri pattern of the resource(s) to be found. A wildcard can be used, e.g. "/tobefound/*".

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: resourceRemove
operation.description: The Resource Remove processor removes resources from the CoAP server. All resources that apply to the uri pattern will be removed. Clients that observe a removed resource will be notified.

parameter.name: uriPattern
parameter.description: The uri pattern of the resource(s) that will be deleted. Wildcards can be used, like "/*" or "/some/deeper/resources/*".

source.name: ResponseHandler
source.description: The Response Handler message source receives responses on asynchronous CoAP client requests and observe notifications. The CoAP messages received are delivered to the flow.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

source.name: observer
source.description: The Observer message source observes a CoAP resource on a server. The CoAP notifications received from the server are delivered to the flow. The resource is observed during runtime of the flow. When an observe relation with the server could not be established or is lost, the flow is notified of the error and the observe request is retried continuously.

parameter.name: observerName
parameter.description: The name of the observer instance.

parameter.name: confirmable
parameter.description: When true the server is expected to acknowledge reception of the observe request.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname or ip of the server to observe. This overrides client host configuration.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the server is listening on. This overrides client port configuration.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: The path on the server of the resource to observe.

parameter.name: queryParamConfigs
parameter.description: The query parameters to send with the observe request.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

source.name: listener
source.description: The Listener message source receives requests on resources of the CoAP server. The requests on the resources that apply to the resource uri-pattern given, will be listened. When multiple listeners apply the listener with the most specific uri-pattern will process the requests and deliver it to the flow.

parameter.name: uriPattern
parameter.description: The uriPattern defines the resources the listener listens on. The listener will get requests to process for a resource when it has the most specific pattern that complies to the resources path.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

parameter.name: responseCode
parameter.description: The CoAP response code to be set in the CoAP response.

parameter.name: responsePayload
parameter.description: The payload of the CoAP response message.

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: The CoAP options to be set in the CoAP response.
